post_title: For Sale: T2o6 Ty Cobbs (2 Left) Lowered Prices...(again)
post_content:

Green Portrait $3,500
Bat On sgc1 SOLD

Obo
Ppff or Venmo. Ships bmwt/full value Insurance

Ryan
PM Sent - I'll take the Cobb Bat On
